main event: Observers reported seeing a light in the sky that changed colors between red, yellow, white, and green for approximately 45 minutes.
interesting points: The observation was made by 2 civilians,The object appeared to change colors during the sighting,It was not confirmed whether the object moved behind or in front of clouds,The conclusion of the report suggested it was likely an astronomical phenomenon,There were no photographs or physical evidence included in the report.
sighted object: one changing colored light in the sky
